alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lanier, Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quitman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Quitman, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Greenwood, Twin Lakes, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
